description: This source file defines a collaborative team of AI agents designed to research topics across different platforms (Reddit and HackerNews). It sets up agents with specific tools and instructions, and manages their collaboration in 'collaborate' mode, including initiating a discussion on a programming learning topic.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific roles, models, and tools for research tasks.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Manages a group of agents working together in specified modes, such as collaboration.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Initiates the team discussion with a specified message.
